scripts.subgraph:up: npm run sandbox:down && npm run prepare:local && ./start.sh
scripts.deploy:local: graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 notional-finance/local-v2 && graph deploy notional-finance/local-v2 ./subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020
scripts.deploy:kovan: yarn run prepare:kovan && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/kovan-v2
scripts.deploy:goerli: yarn run prepare:goerli && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/goerli-v2
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn run prepare:mainnet && yarn run codegen && graph deploy --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ notional-finance/mainnet-v2
scripts.deploy:mainnet-fork: yarn run prepare:mainnet && yarn run codegen && yarn run graph create --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 notional-finance/mainnet-v2 && yarn run graph deploy --node http://127.0.0.1:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001/ --debug-fork QmQFAksNkZxyY6XdkEHAoWogYzouKRaq8pUCdVJoj6t2DL notional-finance/mainnet-v2
scripts.compile:subgraph: yarn run prepare:local && yarn run codegen && yarn run build && yarn run deploy:local
